Package com.metamx.rdiclient

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RdiClient<T>
    Interface for creating a client to post data to Metamarkets real-time data ingestion API.
    Serializer<T>
    Interface for building classes to serialize events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JacksonSerializer<T>
    Uses a Jackson ObjectMapper to serialize events to byte arrays.
    PassthroughSerializer
    Serializer that accepts a bytearray and returns it unaltered.
    RdiClientConfig
    RdiClient config class.
    RdiClientConfig.Builder  
    RdiClientImpl<T>  
    RdiClients
    This class contains methods for creating an RdiClient.
    RdiResponse  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RdiClientConfig.ContentEncoding  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RdiException
    The RdiException class is a form of Throwable for conditions that may be encountered by an RdiClient.
    RdiHttpResponseException
    Class for making exceptions based off Http Response codes (e.g.
